io.libraft.agent.configuration
Class RaftConfigurationLoader

java.lang.Object
  io.libraft.agent.configuration.RaftConfigurationLoader

public abstract class RaftConfigurationLoader
extends Object

Provides static utility methods for constructing and validating RaftConfiguration instances.

Method Detail

loadFromFile

public static RaftConfiguration loadFromFile(String configFile)
                                      throws IOException
Load and validate a RaftAgent configuration from the specified configuration file.

See the project README.md for more on the configuration file options and format.

Parameters:
configFile - absolute path of the libraft-agent configuration file
Returns:
fully-populated and validated RaftConfiguration instance. This instance can be used as an argument to RaftAgent.RaftAgent(RaftConfiguration, io.libraft.RaftListener).
Throws:
IOException - if configFile does not exist or cannot be found
RaftConfigurationException - if the configuration specified in configFile has errors

validate

public static RaftConfiguration validate(RaftConfiguration configuration)
Validates a pre-existing RaftConfiguration instance. The following basic validation checks are performed:
  • All required configuration fields are present.
  • There are no unrecognized configuration elements.
  • Endpoints are specified in valid "host:port" form.
  • All ports are in the valid port range.
  • All timeouts have values >= 0.
If an optional configuration block is present, it too is validated using the rules above. More thorough validation is performed by components that use the configuration properties.

Parameters:
configuration - instance of RaftConfiguration to validate
Returns:
configuration (useful if callers would like to method-chain)
Throws:
RaftConfigurationException - if the configuration specified in configuration has errors
